ApiKeyCoinmarketCap.Comment: Sign up for free on https://pro.coinmarketcap.com/signup. To get you API key go to the dashboard under 'Overview' and genereate the key. Copy and paste it's value here.

ApiKeyForex.Comment: Sign up for free on https://openexchangerates.org/signup/free for a free plan. To get your API key go to the dashboard under 'App IDs' and genereate the key. Copy and paste it's value here.

ApiKeyEthGas.Comment: Sign up for free on https://etherscan.io/apis. To get you API key go to your profile, chose API Keys and genereate the key. Copy and paste the token value here.

AdditionalFiat.Comment: Enter your desired additional Fiat currency. The values will automatically be exchanged from USD $

AdditionalFiat2.Comment: Enter your desired additional Fiat currency. The values will automatically be exchanged from USD $
